00057 
00058 int lnp_routing_handle(net_id_t id_from, net_id_t id_to, u_char *packet_hash, 
00059                 u_char packet_flags, int session_from) {
00060         int collision = lnp_handle_collision(packet_hash, packet_flags);
00061         if (collision != NO_COLLISION) {
00062                 return LNP_ROUTE_DROP;
00063         }
00064         
00065         handle_id_from(id_from, session_from);
00066 
00067         if (memcmp(id_to, my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH) == 0) {
00068                 return LNP_ROUTE_RECEIVE;       
00069         }
00070         
00071         return get_next_session(id_to, session_from);
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*============================================================================*/
00075 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00076 /*============================================================================*/
00077 
00078 void handle_id_from(net_id_t id_from, int session_from) {
00079         if (session_from < 0 || session_from >= 256) {
00080                 return; 
00081         }
00082         int routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id_from);
00083         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00084                 /* TODO otimizar isso aki: call{lnp_add_id + lnp_routing_entry_lock}*/
00085                 routing_entry_index = lnp_add_id(id_from);
00086                 routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id_from);
00087         }
00088         if (routing_entry_index != LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00089                 history_entry_t * history_entry 
00090                                 = &routing_table[routing_entry_index].history;
00091                 lnp_history_insert(history_entry, session_from);
00092                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00093         }
00094 }
00095 /******************************************************************************/
00096 int get_next_session(net_id_t id_to, int session_from) {
00097         int routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id_to);
00098         if (routing_entry_index != LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00099                 history_entry_t * history_entry 
00100                                 = &routing_table[routing_entry_index].history;
00101                 int session_to;
00102                 session_to = lnp_history_get_route(history_entry, session_from);
00103                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00104                 if (session_to == LNP_HISTORY_NO_ROUTE) {
00105                         if (session_from < 0 || session_from >= 256) {
00106                                 return LNP_ROUTE_BROADCAST;
00107                         } else {
00108                                 return LNP_ROUTE_BACK_WITH_ERROR;
00109                         }
00110                 } else {
00111                         return session_to;      
00112                 }
00113         }
00114         return LNP_ROUTE_BACK_WITH_ERROR;       
00115 }
